Overview  Package   Extension 

org::fornax::utilities::xtendtools::lib
Extension uml

This extension provides utility functions for UML models.
Function Summmary

BooleanisComposition(Property this)
    Returns true, if the property was a composition.
PropertyoppositeProperty(Property this)
    This extension returns the opposite of the given uml::Property prop.
cached TypegetType(Model this, String name)
    Returns the primitivy type with the name name, if such a type existed in the model, or null, otherwise.
cached List[PrimitiveType]standardPrimitives(Model this)
    Returns a list of all primitive types contained in the model.

    Applies the stereotype with the name name to this element.

    Tools persist models in different XMI-dialects.

fixSelfReference

Void fixSelfReference(Model this)
Tools persist models in different XMI-dialects. This modifcation fixes self-references of classes (e.g. for Topcased)
